items.name: Iced Coffee
items.description: Chilled coffee with a hint of sweetness, perfect for a warm day.

items.name: Lemonade
items.description: Classic tangy and refreshing lemonade, freshly squeezed.

items.name: Mango Lassi
items.description: A creamy and sweet Indian drink made with yogurt and fresh mango pulp.

items.name: Mojito
items.description: Refreshing blend of mint, lime, sugar, and soda water.

items.name: Cold Coffee with Ice Cream
items.description: Blended cold coffee topped with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

items.name: Cappuccino
items.description: Espresso with steamed milk and a deep layer of foam.

items.name: Masala Chai
items.description: Traditional Indian tea brewed with aromatic spices and milk.

items.name: Hot Chocolate
items.description: Rich and decadent hot chocolate, topped with whipped cream.

items.name: Espresso
items.description: A concentrated shot of rich, dark coffee.

items.name: Green Tea
items.description: Light and refreshing green tea, known for its health benefits.

items.name: Vegetable Biryani
items.description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked with mixed vegetables and traditional Indian spices.

items.name: Paneer Tikka Masala
items.description: Cubes of paneer (Indian cheese) cooked in a rich, creamy tomato gravy.

items.name: Chicken Sandwich
items.description: Grilled chicken breast with fresh lettuce, tomato, and a special sauce, served on toasted bread.

items.name: Butter Chicken
items.description: Tender chicken pieces simmered in a rich, buttery tomato gravy.

items.name: Veggie Burger
items.description: A wholesome veggie patty with fresh vegetables and special sauce in a toasted bun.

items.name: Gulab Jamun
items.description: Deep-fried milk-solids dumplings soaked in a rose-flavored sugar syrup.

items.name: Chocolate Brownie
items.description: Warm, fudgy chocolate brownie, perfect with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

items.name: Fruit Custard
items.description: Creamy vanilla custard loaded with fresh seasonal fruits.

items.name: Ice Cream Sundae
items.description: Multiple scoops of ice cream with various toppings, sauces, and whipped cream.

items.name: Rasgulla
items.description: Soft and spongy cheese dumplings soaked in a light sugar syrup.
